thread.title: Modesty on Instagram Is a Tough Balance

author: Batsheva Neuer
title: Modesty on Instagram Is a Tough Balance
text:
Orthodox Jewish fashion blogging may sound like an oxymoron. Yet the unlikely social-media phenomenon has taken off, particularly on Instagram. Today the best known modesty bloggers have thousands of followers and shape how countless Jewish women dress across the world. But is it all kosher? 

Orthodox women face a host of sartorial challenges thanks to prohibitive rabbinical dress-code guidelines. When in public, they must cover their shoulders and knees at all times. Married women are required to cloak their hair. Modesty...
